function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential for transmission of contagious diseases among construction sector participants","Impact":"Increased risk of spreading contagious diseases in the construction sector","Mitigation":"Implementation of strict health and safety protocols, regular testing, and vaccination programs","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, remote monitoring technology, and air filtration systems","People":"Construction sector participants, including workers, engineers, and experts","Owner":"Employers, government health agencies, and industry associations"}]}
